Tenten takes out a big [[scroll]] and waves it in a circle. It turns into a giant chain hammer with a huge metal ball at the end that she then crushes the opponent with. After crushing her opponent, the metal ball turns back into a scroll.

[[es:Armas Manipuladas: Masa Gigante de Hierro]]
[[fr:Outil de Ninja - Grande Forfaitaire de Fer]]
[[pl:Sōgu: Dai Tekkai]]
